title: Error while training model
body:
Hello,

Trying & testing loudml.
Unfortunately, I got following error when training my model:
```
$> loudml train  loudml-timeseries-model --from "now-3d" --to "now-2d"
/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/h5py/__init__.py:34: FutureWarning: Conversion of the second argument of issubdtype from `float` to `np.floating` is deprecated. In future, it will be treated as `np.float64 == np.dtype(float).type`.
  from ._conv import register_converters as _register_converters
INFO:root:train(loudml-timeseries-model) range=[2018-04-21T13:43:47.902Z, 2018-04-22T13:43:47.903Z] train_size=0.670000 batch_size=64 epochs=100)
INFO:root:connecting to influxdb on 127.0.0.1:8086, using database 'collectd'
INFO:root:found 289 time periods
INFO:root:Preprocessing. mins: [0.] maxs: [2.84758255e+08] ranges: [2.84758255e+08]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/loudml", line 11, in <module>
    load_entry_point('loudml==1.2', 'console_scripts', 'loudml')()
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/loudml/cli.py", line 432, in main
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/loudml/cli.py", line 257, in exec
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/loudml/timeseries.py", line 543, in train
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/loudml/timeseries.py", line 415, in _train_on_dataset
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/hyperopt/fmin.py", line 307, in fmin
    return_argmin=return_argmin,
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/hyperopt/base.py", line 635, in fmin
    return_argmin=return_argmin)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/hyperopt/fmin.py", line 314, in fmin
    pass_expr_memo_ctrl=pass_expr_memo_ctrl)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/hyperopt/base.py", line 786, in __init__
    pyll.toposort(self.expr)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/hyperopt/pyll/base.py", line 715, in toposort
    assert order[-1] == expr
TypeError: 'generator' object is not subscriptable
```

loudml is installed on debian 9.4
```
$> python3 -V
Python 3.5.3

$> pip3 list
elasticsearch (6.2.0)
influxdb (5.0.0)
tensorflow (1.3.0)
hyperopt (0.1)
dateutils (0.6.6)

$> # dpkg -l loudml*
ii  loudml                                         1.2.4 
ii  loudml-influx                                  1.2.4   

$> cat model.yml 
---
name: loudml-timeseries-model
type: timeseries
default_datasource: monitor
# Size of buckets for data aggregation and prediction 
bucket_interval: 5m
# Number of preceding buckets required to predict the next bucket
span: 3
# interval in seconds
interval: 60
offset: 30
max_evals: 5
features:
  - name: calls
    measurement: kamailio_value
    metric: sum
    field: value
    default: 0
```
